long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension adds to IG videos more controls for the user, play/pause, modify volume with levels, fast forward or rewind and full screen videos.

Allows you to have more controls of the videos on IG web.

Privacy Policy:
This extension does not track any user data, and therefore does not have a detailed privacy policy.

CHANGELOG:
v1.0.1:
- Fixed some bugs on the video improvements.
v1.0.0:
- Add to every video on IG more controls.








Icon obtained from here:
https://www.shareicon.net/video-post-record-instagram-886563
